channel.title: The systen cannot find path specified
channel.description:
Well every time i try to run any 317 client im getting this,
[code]The system cannot find the path specified. Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Gui Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: Gui at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: Gui. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
I have no idea whats wrong with it, and ive already tried changing my environmental variables, and of couse the edit and change the jre version (im not a noob) but i think it has to do with my bariables i dunno i might be wrong? Help would be greatly appreciated
THanks!

item.title: The systen cannot find path specified
item.dc:creator: @Mushy13 Mushy13
item.description:
@Mushy13 wrote:

Ah do either of you have teamview? i really need help lol.

Read full topic
item.source: The systen cannot find path specified

item.title: The systen cannot find path specified
item.dc:creator: @The_Outsider The Outsider
item.description:
@The_Outsider wrote:

You might not be changing directory properly. i.e. your class files are in bin and you have no “cd bin” in the batch file.

Read full topic
item.source: The systen cannot find path specified

item.title: The systen cannot find path specified
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

Oh didn’t see that.

The path can’t be found…

Read full topic

item.title: The systen cannot find path specified
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

Because you prob updated your jdk.

Find out what’s causing the 100 errors(may not be just a bracket).

Read full topic
item.source: The systen cannot find path specified

item.title: The systen cannot find path specified
item.dc:creator: @Mushy13 Mushy13
item.description:
@Mushy13 wrote:

In order for me to compile it i have to change the jdk version to .26 instead of .24, then when i compile it i get 100+ errors, Should i just download jdk .24? and you got tv to possibly help me in greater detail? (btw i ran this server in augustish worked fined, now comeing back to it all messed up?)

Read full topic
item.source: The systen cannot find path specified

item.title: The systen cannot find path specified
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

No, compile it.

The classes were compiled using a different jdk/jre than your jdk/jre.

Read full topic
item.source: The systen cannot find path specified

item.title: The systen cannot find path specified
item.dc:creator: @Mushy13 Mushy13
item.description:
@Mushy13 wrote:

imsuperman05:

Compile the client with the same jdk/jre used to run the client.

the code i posted was the error i got when trying to RUN the client, im not having compile issues

Read full topic
